item.title: 多项式全家桶
item.description: 模版 多项式全家桶 #include <bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; const int mod = 998244353; const int maxn = (1<<22) + 5; struct NTT { const ll g = 3, invg = inv(g); // mod = 998244353 inline ll qpow(ll a, ll b) { ll res = 1; while (b) { if (b & 1) res = res * a % mod; a = a * a
